system.description: The character hurls a barrage of their element at their foes.
system.effect: The character designates a space within their line of sight. The attack can affect every enemy within 10 spaces of that. The character makes a single Ego check and compares it to each target's Resilience defense. Affected enemies take half regular damage. On a Fantastic success, they take full regular damage and the elemental type's special effect.
